level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: Sections 8-2204 through 8-2209 shall apply upon the inclusion of their fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Surveyor of the District of Columbia, duties, see § 1-1301 et seq.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-289
level.text: For history of Law 18-289, see notes under § 8-2201.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: The Budget Director of the Council of the District of Columbia has determined, as of February 15, 2012, that the fiscal effect of Law 18-289 has not been included in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore, the provisions of sections 5 through 10 of Law 18-289 are not in effect.
